hints.content:
$\green{80}$ tickets is the same as $\green{8\text{ groups of ten}}$ tickets.

There were $\red7$ concerts.

Total number of tickets sold:  
$\begin{align}&\red7\times\green{8\text{ groups of ten}}\\
=&\purple{56\text{ groups of ten}}\\
=&\purple{560}\end{align}$

question.content:
An orchestra played $7$ concerts in a concert hall. $80$ tickets were sold for each concert.

**How many tickets were sold in all?**

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] tickets
